Name: Inu's Adventure
About the game: Escape the evil robots in a fun action-adventure 3d platformer die&retry, through a laboratory filled with traps and tests. You play an Akita Inu in third person view who will need to jump, sprint, bark, crawl, smell, mark the territory, MEGABARK, and rest sometimes... All of the features above help you, for one thing, not to die. But if you still do, you will spawn right away to the last checkpoint and be ready to jump right back into the action. The main story, revolves around your place in the world and your relation to the Pr. Ripley, is told mostly through Manga Pages Be ready to face the different experiments the Pr. Ripley prepared for you ! You won't only have to jump from platform to platform or dodge incoming threats you will also have to pass the professor's experimentation. Will you dodge everything and pass all the tests to escape the lab ?
